name: Red Aleph
description:
Red Aleph is an arena arcade shooter style game. Your enemies will come in number to defeat you, they'll challenge you with invisible foes, sniper turret, suicide bombers, death rays, evil clones, gravity holes and others...

Your goal is to score as much as possible. With the possibility to choose your own actives and passives skill, will you be able to beat each 4 bosses that spawn every 15 waves ?

Features:

  • 16 differents types of enemies
  • 4 deadly bosses
  • 9 types of waves
  • 32 actives modifiers for each skills
  • 15 passives modifiers for the player
  • 7 visual palettes
  • 4 audio palettes
  • 30 challenges
